overview: A dramatic tale of love and betrayal, Pagliacci revolves around a commedia del arte troupe. Canio and Nedda are married, and the leads in the troupe along with Tonio and Beppe, however Nedda is secretly having an affair with Silvio. ... During a performance, Canio confronts Nedda, and stabs her.
title: Pagliacci - The Manoel
